noisepp::AbsoluteModule

noisepp::AbsoluteModule Class Reference

#include <NoiseAbsolute.h>

Inheritance diagram for noisepp::AbsoluteModule:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Calculates the absolute value of the value from the source module.
